question:
Khajuraho Group of Monuments:
  1. are one of the UNESCO World Heritage Sites in India
  2. are famous for their Nagara-style architectural symbolism
  3. were mainly constructed by Chandela dynasty
  Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: Khajuraho Group of Monuments was constructed mainly between 950 and 1050 by the Chandela dynasty. They are famous for their Nagara-style temple architecture and erotic carvings on walls.
